remarks: Distribution of existential quantifiers, with a bound-variable hypothesis saying that ` y ` is not free in ` ph ` , but ` x ` can be free in ` ph ` (and there is no distinct variable condition on ` x ` and ` y ` ).  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 25-Feb-2018.)
statement:
exdistrfor.1 $e |- ( A. x x = y \/ A. x F/ y ph ) $.
exdistrfor $p |- ( E. x E. y ( ph /\ ps ) -> E. x ( ph /\ E. y ps ) ) $.
